title: Analysis:Strong start to online holiday shopping masks signs of a fragile US consumer
description: NEW YORK, Dec 2 : The U.S. holiday shopping season kicked off to record online sales. But underlying signs of economic fragility signal a pullback in spending could be looming. Consumer confidence fell again in November. Still, Americans spent a record $44.2 …
content:
